Description: The Virgin Mary seated to left, with upper body twisted and head tilted to look down at the infant Jesus, standing at left, reaching over her lap towards a bowl of water she holds in her left hand; border of a line around the image; after Barocci. Lithograph, printed in sepia
Producer name: Print made by: Charlotte De Ros
Curator's comments: Although the print is lettered with 'Correggio' as the original artist, a note on the verso suggests that it was made after a study by Federico Barocci for his 'Rest on Flight into Egypt' in the Vatican. See 1837,0408.112 for another impression.
